title: Pink Mountaintops - S/T - slavetothesound FLAC
description:
This one&#039;s a little bare, I can&#039;t give you the .cue file or EAC logs for this one, but the music is there and its good so give it a listen. I found this one at the library a few weeks ago and wasn&#039;t planning on uploading it at the time - I was just excited to find that the library had CDs. I encourage all of you to go to your local libraries and see if they&#039;ve got some good music you can rip and then upload to share with all of us :)

Pink Mountaintops is a side project of Stephen McBeans (Black Mountain front man) and runs along the same vein as Black Mountain, though maybe a little more on the experimental side of things. It&#039;s not the equal of Black Mountain, but if you like BM then you&#039;ll probably enjoy hearing this, too.

Also, I&#039;m now kicking myself for ever using the iTunes store to buy music when I was too impatient to wait for a CD to come in the mail... I bought the other Pink Mountain album, Axis of Evol, a while back and am wishing that I had it in lossless. If anyone&#039;s got that album, please put up a lossless torrent for us! ;)
